sentences.sContent: He felt the press of modern life.
sentences.sContent_eng: He felt the press of modern life.
sentences.sCn: 他感觉到现代生活的压力。

sentences.sContent: I felt lonesome in the strange land.
sentences.sContent_eng: I felt lonesome in the strange land.
sentences.sCn: 在那陌生的地方我觉得寂寞。

sentences.sContent: She felt colour flame up in her cheeks.
sentences.sContent_eng: She felt colour flame up in her cheeks.
sentences.sCn: 她感到脸上火辣辣地红了起来。

words.tran: 有感觉的；有同情心的；富于感情的
感动地，充满感情地；衷心地
感觉，触觉；感情，情绪；同情
感觉；认为（feel的现在分词）；触摸
